::Magmatron/Cerberus/Jynx::

    Magmatron noticed the two bots watching, b=
ut paid them no heed. He put Cerberus down and smiled.
    "So, tell me," H=
e said to Cerberus. "What are your plans here on Earth?"
    Cerberus didn'=
t trust him, so he wouldn't tell him everything. "I am helping the Maximals=
 rebuild the Ark, and relocating this base."
    "You're helping the Maxima=
ls?" Magmatron said in surprise. "What's your angel?"
    Cerberus knew tha=
t Magmatron could tell he had ulterior motives, so Cerberus told him. "I wa=
nt to win the Maximal's trust. So I can take down the Alliance."
    Magmat=
ron took this news in stride. "Hmm...When I left they were a power, but not=
 a major one, ow do you plan to kill them?"
    "In one massive attack," Ce=
rberus was almost glowing, he reveled in talking about his battles.
    "Th=
at wouldn't work," Magmatron said. "Jynx, do you have any ideas?"
    "Yes,=
 my lord," Jynx said. "We get them down in numbers by attacking in groups. =
A set number of bots attack and take some Alliance members down. Then they =
go to repair, another group takes their place, and the cycle starts over ag=
ain."
    "Excellent idea. That is presicely the reason I made you," Magmat=
ron said. He turned to Cerberus. "Give me a name of some other group that i=
s helping."
    Magmatron knew this because Cerberus told him he wanted the=
 Maximals to help.
    "Kit Kat," Cerberus said.
